Package de.weltraumschaf.commons.shell

Sub package for a simple interactive shell.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CommandType Marker interface for shell command types.
CommandVerifier Implementors verifies the passed command.
MainCommandType Marker interface for shell main command types.
Parser Parses input line from interactive shell.
Scanner Scans the input line from an interactive shell.
SubCommandType Marker interface for shell sub command types.
 

Class Summary
CharacterHelper Helper class to verify if a given character belong to a specified group or range of characters.
LiteralCommandMap Maps the literal string of an command to its enum type.
NullCommandVerifier Verifies nothing.
Parsers Factory to create parsers.
Scanners Factory to create scanners.
ShellCommand Describes a parsed command of the interactive shell.
Token<T> Represent a token scanned from interactive shell input.
 

Enum Summary
TokenType Type of tokens scanned from interactive shell.
 

Exception Summary
SyntaxException Signals syntax errors in the input scanned from an interactive shell.
 

Package de.weltraumschaf.commons.shell Description

Sub package for a simple interactive shell. Contains: - input scanner/parser - helper classes for scanning - shell command and token abstraction

This package is a part of the open-source Commons
